definition: to stroll around the streets (esp. of a young couple)
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
